text: Arau yisakale imana aniche te'omloke kaya, eta churaa aratirna karaa nahaya kiya, tara pichata yadi kono muhakama churaa aratirna haya arau tata yud'dhara kono nirdesa thake, tetiya tumi dekhiba yisakalara antarata byadhi ache sihamte mrtyura bhayata bihbala manuhara darae tomara phale ca'i ache. Eteke sihamtara babe uttama achila
